attributes.action: Bring back dog licences and hold owners more responsible
attributes.additional_details:
Bring back dog licences. Set out rules and checks for  people to prove they are good owners. It should be reviewed every year.
Higher prosecution/penalties for irresponsible owners.
attributes.background: It's unfair that dog breeds are banned when in fact its all down to the responsibility of the owner to train a dog correctly and be able to control them. Dogs are not to blame, owners are.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650

Introduce licences, mandatory training and annual vet visits to own a dog: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643739
